about.title: About Us
about.motto: Because every story deserves an unforgettable beginning.
text: Welcome to Bachelor & Bachelorette Parties Malta, where ordinary days turn into legendary memories.
We specialize in bachelor and bachelorette parties that go beyond the usual – moments filled with excitement, adventure, laughter, and style.

Our mission is to craft tailor-made experiences for every group – whether you're dreaming of a luxury yacht getaway, an adrenaline-filled weekend, or simply quality time with friends surrounded by Malta's stunning scenery.
We work exclusively with trusted partners and offer stays in elegant private farmhouses. From airport pickup to the final toast, we handle everything.
We believe every bachelorette party should be unique, stress-free, and perfectly organized.
And that’s exactly what we deliver.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before booking your unforgettable experience in Malta
terms.intro: At Bachelor/Bachelorette Parties Malta, we are committed to providing exceptional experiences for your celebration. To ensure mutual understanding, please review the terms and conditions outlined below.

section1.title: Introduction
content: By booking or using our services, you agree to the terms and conditions set by 'Bachelor/Bachelorette Parties Malta'.

section2.title: Booking and Payment
content: All bookings must be confirmed in advance through our website or by direct contact.
Full payment is required at the time of booking to secure your reservation.
Prices may vary depending on the package, number of participants, and the season.

section3.title: Cancellation and Refund Policy
content: All payments are final. No refunds will be issued under any circumstances, including cancellations, missed events, or schedule changes.
We strongly recommend that clients purchase personal travel insurance for unforeseen situations.

section4.title: Changes or Cancellations by Us
content: If an event must be changed or canceled due to safety concerns, weather, or availability, we will do our best to provide a suitable replacement activity.
No monetary refunds will be issued. Replacements are offered at our discretion.

section5.title: Liability
content: Participation in all events is at your own risk.
We are not responsible for any injuries, property damage, or losses.
All guests are expected to behave respectfully and responsibly.

section6.title: Age and Conduct
content: The minimum age to participate is 18.
Inappropriate behavior may result in removal from the event with no refund or compensation.

section7.title: Acceptance
content: By booking, you confirm that you fully understand and accept these terms.
